title: New: The Delphines – Panic / Uptown Lover (Demo)
content:
Wow, check out this sexy, rumbling bassline from Milwaukee outfit The Delphines.

Slightly grungey beach-pop, Panic is too slick for words, landing somewhere between The Kills and Best Coast, with it’s blissed out attitude and seductive approach. So the B-side follows a fairly similar formula and sounds slightly like a sixteen year old’s first attempt at recording, but hey, why try to fix something that ain’t broken, right? The Delphines are bloody brilliant, and more people should know it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
